column4: Hi! i have installed kde, i want to configure compiz to get the cube effect i *had in gnome. How can i do this?
HELP LEASE
please be patient
which version of kde are you using?
freeride, xamox thanks for you replies, i have already installed compiz but i cannot get the cube effect, i can just get two desktops
im using 4.3 i think
you probably need compiz-kde and libcompizconfig-backend-kconfig instyalled too
didnt know kde specific packages existed i will try installing them
you may repeat, but don't do it too frequently
the irc command for joining a channel is /join #channel.  maybe he missed the /?
huh?
just be patient and keep watching this channel. You could also check the online forums for ubuntu
I personally don't know how to fix your issue, sorry
someone else here might know, but it's not exactly a common issue
ok thanks for your help :)
what you are trying to do might not be possible
you could try deleting the swap partition, resizing the ubuntu partition, then creating a logical partition for swap
I don't know if that would work though
you can edit it in /etc/fstab, I think
i'll google it thanks for your help! very appreciated
what gave you that error?
installing pygame
make sure that you installed build-essential
